text:
[Verse]
In the night so bright
Dancing shadows glide
Under city lights
We'll escape the tide

[Verse 2]
Stars above so high
Whispers in the air
Time is passing by
We don't have a care

[Chorus]
Shadows dance all night
Hearts are beating fast
Hold me oh so tight
Make this moment last

[Verse 3]
Footsteps on the ground
Rhythm in our veins
Lost and then we're found
Love like summer rain

[Bridge]
Echoes of our song
Filling empty streets
Here we both belong
In the shadows' beats

[Chorus]
Shadows dance all night
Hearts are beating fast
Hold me oh so tight
Make this moment last
title: Dancing Shadows
